description: a(n)=T(8,n), array T given by A047848.
formula: (11^n + 9)/10. - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 14 2004a(0)= 1, a(1)= 2, a(n)= 12*a(n-1)-11*a(n-2) for n>1. G.f.: (1-10x)/(1-12x+11x^2). [From _Philippe Del√©ham_, Oct 06 2009]a(n)=11*a(n-1)-9 (with a(0)=1) [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2010]
maple: a[0]:=0:a[1]:=1:for n from 2 to 50 do a[n]:=11*a[n-1]+1 od: seq(a[n]+1, n=0..16); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 20 2008
